# Battle of Ballyshannon (1247)

Battle of Ballyshannon}}
}}
Cammhuinealach Ua BaoighillRuaidhri mac Raghnaill
| commander2        = Maurice FitzGeraldWilliam de BritCormac Ua Conchobhair
| strength1         = Unknown

| notes             =

The Battle of Ballyshannon () was fought in 1247 between Maurice FitzGerald, Justiciar of Ireland and Melaghlin O'Donnell, King of Tyrconnell, Kinel-Moen, Inishowen, and Fermanagh, near Ballyshannon, Ireland. Maurice FitzGerald defeated and killed Melaghlin O'Donnell.
